title: Investigating the Paranormal - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/19/17
itunes:title: Investigating the Paranormal - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/19/17
description:
George Noory and guest Peter Sacco discuss his investigation into the paranormal and ghosts and how to use real science to convince skeptics that paranormal events are real.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
